title: BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Announces Supplemental Liquidity Facility
text:
BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Announces Supplemental Liquidity Facility

Stock Markets 39 minutes ago (Sep 03, 2019 23:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Announces Supplemental Liquidity Facility Sept 3 (Reuters) - Fortress Global Enterprises Inc : * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES ANNOUNCES SUPPLEMENTAL LIQUIDITY FACILITY * FIRST ADVANCE UNDER FACILITY IN AMOUNT OF $2.5 MILLION WILL BE COMPLETED ON SEPT 4 * $10 MILLION OF FACILITY REMAINS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF QUÉBEC GOVERNMENT * FORTRESS SPECIALTY CELLULOSE AND FORTRESS BIOENERGY ENTER FINANCING AGREEMENT WITH SECURED LENDERS OR THEIR AFFILIATES FOR SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY OF UP TO $15 MILLION * FACILITY WILL ACCRUE INTEREST AT A RATE OF 10% PER ANNUM, PAYABLE MONTHLY IN ARREARS

BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Announces Supplemental Liquidity Facility
description: BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Announces Supplemental Liquidity Facility
